title: Project Theme Songs
body: The violinist, especially in Jhin's theme sounds amazing. I wish I could see an actual video of the whole thing being played by the actual instruments / people in RIOT.

replies.body:
Hey Muten Shensei,

I wrote both Jhin's music and all of the music for Project Hunters (2017 Project). 

Thanks for your kind words! Unfortunately, we din't tape any of the sessions for either project... We're looking to do more of that in the future!

Thanks for playing!

Ed the Conqueror

Oh my god.
So it's you who wrote the best fucking login theme ever.

Do you mind if I love you?

> [{quoted}](name=Fisher No Chains,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=75zNbUIP,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2018-03-16T13:47:43.693+0000)
>
> Oh my god.
> So it's you who wrote the best fucking login theme ever.
> 
> Do you mind if I love you?

Please, love away! As long as you let me love you back!

Thanks for listening!

Ed the Conqueror

> [{quoted}](name=Ed the Conqueror,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=75zNbUIP,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-03-15T20:35:12.216+0000)
>
> Hey Muten Shensei,
> 
> I wrote both Jhin's music and all of the music for Project Hunters (2017 Project). 
> 
> Thanks for your kind words! Unfortunately, we din't tape any of the sessions for either project... We're looking to do more of that in the future!
> 
> Thanks for playing!
> 
> Ed the Conqueror

That's awsome!! I can't wait...music makes imagination happen, and I love your work. I'm in a different mindset when I hear it / play with a champion. It's a skin itself, if not more. 

{{champion:98}}
